website_summaries.verdict: Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance is an enjoyable but flawed adventure through a magical Disney universe.
pros: Wonderfully detailed Disney environmentsMickey and Donald are an amusing double actFast-paced battlesBeautiful, Disney-based soundtrackInsanely cute dream eaters
cons: Horribly confusing storylineFrustrating boss battlesLittle in the way of exploration or side questsAwkward spell-switching controls

customer_reviews.title: Game was just dropped into envelope
customer_reviews.text: When my son’s Kingdom Hearts 3D Dream Distance arrived, I realize it was a used product, but the game had just been thrown into a padded envelope. There was a plastic sleeve it might have once fit into; but the sleeve had a slit on one side, and was obviously not adequate protection to protect the game. I am extremely displeased, and do not recommend this 3rd party seller if you’re considering a used purchase. We will be very lucky if the game still works!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Martin

customer_reviews.title: Tutorial simulator for the masses!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about game designing, but I would think that if my controls were sooooo unintuitive that I need intrusive tutorials every 4 minutes for the first 2 hours of the game, I might be doing it wrong...
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great all around! Would recommend for any age!
customer_reviews.text: This game did not disappoint! It arrived on time, well packaged and I immediately opened it and started playing it. The graphics were great, the story line was wonderful and it's an easy game to follow along with. I am a huge Kingdom Hearts fan and I 100% recommend this for any other fan or any parent buying a younger one a game for a DS. It's not inappropriate or too difficult and would be great for kids that have prior video game experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As amazing as KH1, KH2, and Birth by Sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations for this game graphic wise, or gameplay. I only have 9 hours in and it's right next to Birth by Sleep in awesomeness. The drop system takes some getting used to, but it's not as irritating as you would think. It actually helps you get the most out of Sora and Riku's worlds and issues. The Dream Eater creation aspect makes for fun builds and sidekicks. This is an incredible game so far, and I've only finished Traverse Town with both soon to be Keyblade Masters.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Game and Beautiful Graphics
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am a huge Kingdom Heart fan. I have been looking for this game everywhere and I was overjoyed to finally have it. The game is one of my favorites because it is difficult for me to get Kingdom Hearts Games because of their mother console PlayStation. I am a die hard Wii and Nintendo player so this is a great investment to a handheld gaming device and it has one of my favorite characters gaining a big part in the series...most know him as Axel and he makes a serious comeback. I will say no more but it truly is a must for any Kingdom Hearts fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really care for the whole 'switch' mechanic, and I really wished The Hunchback to Notre Dame would have made it into a full-length game as adverse to a handheld. Still, not so bad... I still hate Riku though.....
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this and still plays with it
customer_reviews.text: She like Kingdom Hearts on the Playstation and the Amazon tablet but also still enjoys this on her DS. It keeps her entertained and off the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Kingdom Hearts game
customer_reviews.text: Fun but different. I love the Kingdom Hearts games and have played several this is my 1st DS one. It’s very DS game right now with how you care for the Spirits being similar to how you care for Pokémon in Pokémon Sun & Moon. I’m not fond of the whole time limit thing and then you switch from Riku to Sora (& vice versa) and from level to level.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Bogus

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better than Chain of Memories, not as good as the first game
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a lot of fun and a must-buy for a KH fan. It is not without flaws...for example, the Action Jump and Auto-Lock functions are a little stubborn and will often make your decisions for you. The difficulty of some of the boss battles are bit off. And Riku and Sora make these stupid smiles as they travel between worlds (you'll see it and think the same thing). The graphics are great, the combat is good, the story is intriguing (though occasionally poorly explained, because Square Enix for you), and overall it is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: kingdom hearts is always amazing. this was a gift to a friend and ...
customer_reviews.text: kingdom hearts is always amazing. this was a gift to a friend and he enjoys it thoroughly. i also love kingdom hearts as it creates a great atmosphere and universe full of disney classics and even the newer disney installments with a clash of square enix and their memorable final fantasy charachters. if you love rpgs and idsney this is a great series for you.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: Good game!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I admit it's a different fighting style than the KH 1 and 2 but you get used to it! And I love having the cute sidekick pets that help you in battle. I have mixed feelings about dream drop because I normally forget where I left off the last time I was that character XD but I still highly recommend this game
customer_reviews.author: Smurfgurl

customer_reviews.title: favorite game so far
customer_reviews.text: i love this game so much. its one of my favorite entries in the KH franchise so far. i know its on the ps4 now. but i couldn't help buying this. the game is fun and its enjoyable. with a pokemon feel to it (you'll see why) package came in on time. i recommend this to anyone who loves KH :)
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: A Great addition to the Kingdom Hearts story
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic addition to the Kingdom Hearts series. It plays well on the 3DS XL screen, and the graphics look great. Unfortunately, the sound feels low at times, and if it weren't for the subtitles, you could sometimes miss something during the dialogues. Overall, the game is GREAT, and the story is thrilling, exciting, and gasp-inducing.
customer_reviews.author: Willie G.R.Top Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing game!  A must have for any KH fan!!
customer_reviews.text: As my first KH game, I can say I was curious about the series when opening the game, upon almost completing it, now, I am hooked. From the characters to the worlds to the plot, everything is amazing! The drop meter, while annoying, yes, is easy to work with once you understand it. Even raising/creating your own companions is relatively easy once you understand it. Part of its charm is jumping between Sora and Riku. I don't want to say too much, for this is a game you should experience on your own!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun playing this. Had to pick it up because I'm a huge kh fan but its also great for any casual gamer.. Its combat system is smooth and the dream eater are a wonderful addition to the series. Highly recommend to anyone who owns a 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: Carl taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Fun! Bought used, seller shipped right away, game works great and case was in great condition. Came with booklet inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - very similar to the fighting style on ps2.
customer_reviews.text: I never could get into playing the other Kingdom Hearts DS games, but I'm so happy I gave this one a chance. I've always loved the old PS2 originals, and this one is very much like it, but still different.
customer_reviews.author: duckey

customer_reviews.title: A game for any Kingdom Hearts fan
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge fan of Kingdom Hearts. I am a huge Disney fan and Final Fantasy Fan. This game is just as awesome as the others. If you love the Kingdom Hearts series you need to add this game to your collection!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Set sail again
customer_reviews.text: Sora and Riku's mark of mastery is here. Journey with them through even more disney locations and go back to some from the original Kingdom Hearts. I would recommend this to any Kingdom Hearts fan. As for newbies, play the first and second one first. It will make the experience so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I needed this, and now I need there to be more of it...
customer_reviews.text: I love this game..... I love this game...... I love this game! My only wish is more worlds... Since there are only seven, I've been playing through the game slowly,savoring every single awesome cut scene and plot reveal... Darn me for not having enough money to buy all of the KH games avaliable for the DS and 3Ds...
customer_reviews.author: J.R

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Game, one of the Best Kingdom Hearts!
customer_reviews.text: The game is really amazing, the characters are so complex, and the story of the game is so beautiful. The gameplay is excellent and the graphics are really good. this game is one of the best games on the series of Kingdom Hearts. And the deliver was on time, the service is really good; I never have problems with the shipping of the products. The product was in perfect state. Definitely a perfect product to buy
customer_reviews.author: Teo Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Another great Kingdom Hearts game
customer_reviews.text: The final game we get that sets up Kingdom Hearts 3. Gameplay, music, and story are on point.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived in perfect condition and the cartridge was in working order and still is
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you like hand held games
customer_reviews.text: Brought the PS4 version instead. Don't get me wrong I love the game but, playing it on the tv in HD is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Another great entry
customer_reviews.text: It's a kingdom hearts game. What more can I say? The story is a bit confusing but that's only cause I haven't been playing the other spin offs. If you enjoyed any of the kingdom hearts games, you'll love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... just the graphics alone (for a nintendo game) is amazing. they gave more space in the worlds for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge KH fan and just the graphics alone (for a nintendo game) is amazing. they gave more space in the worlds for you to roam around and gives you the chance to not only play as sora but as riku too. it gets kinda annoying when you just drop and switch from riku to sora (or vise versa) but all and all its a great game =)
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: So Good w the new Nintendo 3DS
customer_reviews.text: Get this game even if you're not a fan and especially if you have the new Nintendo 3DS because this is one of the few older titles that utilized the circle pad pro. With the new 3DS you can use the new c-stick nub and the added L2 and R2 triggers. I played this when it came out and loved it. Playing it on the new 3DS is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Eliot LaMura

customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the game but it’s part of kh
customer_reviews.author: turki

customer_reviews.title: Not a rpg man.
customer_reviews.text: My first rpg. Not a big rpg man but I will try this one. Enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: JERMIN

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Hearts 3D Dream Drop Distance
customer_reviews.text: If you love kingdom hearts, you will love this series. Its by far the best game in the series, the graphics are amazing!! The voices!! The gameplay is amazing!! You won't be disappointed, hours of game play. To Play again and again. Play with your family or by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Anton

customer_reviews.title: Early and brand new just like it said
customer_reviews.text: Mine came early which was a nice surprise made me real happy it also came brand new as promised and oddly it came with 2 instruction booklets which was weird. overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Stonebreaker

customer_reviews.title: recommend to people that want to buy kh3.
customer_reviews.text: Best game from Nintendo handhelds and the story leads to the new kingdom hearts3. If you want to kingdom hearts3 when it comes out play this game because the ending would show what will happen. Please play this first before buying kingdom hearts3 because you be lost on 3.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I love kingdom hearts but this game is kinda lame I still give it 5 stars cause there is kicking wrong with the product it comes how its shown it's just not for me
customer_reviews.author: RedCrucifixion

customer_reviews.title: Need to Own This if You Are a KH Fan
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this game. The spontaneous shifting between the two friends stories was a really nice touch. And the dream worlds and the dream eaters was a really nice way to throw something new at us. I will replay this game again. I saw so many faces that I missed. I cannot wait for the next installment in this series.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Chang

customer_reviews.title: ... since the first one and this one does not disappoint. Love the worlds
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the Kingdom Hearts games since the first one and this one does not disappoint. Love the worlds, the fighting system, and the dream eater companions. A great addition to the franchise.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna J Doskocil

customer_reviews.title: Very hard game, but that's the point
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived to me in perfect condition, so that was nice. I still haven't tried to register it with nintendo, so we'll see if that works, but I'm sure it does. The game itself is a whole new story with new characters, and it's very interesting. Progressing through the story is very hard though. I've been playing it on Normal and some of the bosses are just impossible and frustrating. However, I've been playing Kingdom Hearts since the first one came out, so I knew that's how it always has been. I'll probably switch to easy soon because I'd actually like to progress through the game. Anyways, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Kngdom heart fans with a 3ds must get this or get a ps4 and get KH 2.8 remake and KH 3.
customer_reviews.text: Game is fun and the world's are always fun to explore but the story makes you realize you still have a long way to go to FULLY understand kingdom hearts story.
customer_reviews.author: KillJoyisbad

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the game but it took a while to get ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of the kingdom Heart series, it's worth checking out. I enjoyed the game but it took a while to get used to the gameplay. It's different from the other series. Some fans may or may not like it. But the story is still there and stays true to the kingdom hearts story.
customer_reviews.author: apierrelouis

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how you have a limited time before you drop ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how you have a limited time before you drop to another characters dream its annoying it can happen in the middle of your boss fight and if it does, good luck because youll have to start over
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Seijo

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but could have been better for a Sora and Riku game.
customer_reviews.text: Good game, decent graphic fidelity. The 3D looks good, too, but sometimes you can visibly see the frame per second slow down with it on. It doesn't hurt to leave it off all game. The combat can get repetitive, because Sora and Riku fight in a similar style. The world unique reality shifts try to keep it fresh, but KH Birth by Sleep is still a much better game. Also, flow motion is extremely overpowered. Flow motion is a unique in-game travel and combat system and I just wonder if the developers really wanted it to be that powerful. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Great Adventure
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed every installment in this franchise. As far as the spin-offs go, this is one of the better ones (Birth By Sleep being my favorite). If you're a fan, it's a must. If this is your first outing with the franchise, I would say start with the earlier entries because the story is not easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: A masterpiece both inside and out
customer_reviews.text: Great game I have played it multiple times since I have received it and it shipped quick. If you are looking for a new game to played or are looking for something compatible with the c-stick you should purchase this game. It was also a very low price on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nando Champloo

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but is kind of easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this game it was fun and i got this game because i wanted to further my knowledge of kingdom hearts and I Think the game gives a lot of good information but i would of liked if the game was a little bit longer and challenging because it took me 3 days to finish the game and it was on critical mode. Anyways if you love kingdom hearts and want to know about the next game you should buy this one.=)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive Case and booklet with game
customer_reviews.text: Game was received without case and booklet. There was initials assumably from someones child on the back of the cartridges which I could not wipe off. And I paid way too much for this game to not receive the case and booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Derek27

customer_reviews.title: graphics are amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 19 year old granddaughter and this is what she has to say about Kingdom Hearts. Her rating is four stars because "it does not have as much plot as the previous games, but the graphics are amazing and the battling is a lot more fun because you can use your surroundings and special world abilities to help you fight."
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gregory

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played it since the game bought is defective. Wish I was able to play.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: (>w<)
customer_reviews.text: It's 3D, it's Disney,its Square Enix. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: rainBO

customer_reviews.title: awesome game for the 3ds
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool game if you have been following the kingdom hearts series but since it's on a handheld it's not as big as kingdom hearts 1 and 2 but it's still a good game and it pretty much assures you that kingdom hearts 3 is happening. My only concern is that with so many releases it feels like they're milking the franchise, I just hope that they don't run out of ideas before kh3 comes out, that being said it's a great game I really enjoyed playing it on the 3ds but it will leave you wanting for more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Avila

customer_reviews.title: This game is amazing. They use the deck system like recoded but ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. They use the deck system like recoded but you do not have to use cards. Also a lot of new combos and spells. Best of all you get to play as Rikku as well and he is a monster in this game! The new traveling ability you get is really cool as well. Very versitile for easy chains on enemies in battle and for escape when needed,
customer_reviews.author: leronn

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this game. Eagerly awaiting the remake ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game. Eagerly awaiting the remake on the 2.8 collection.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Another Fine Entry
customer_reviews.text: I love Kingdom Hearts and this is a nice departure from the card slinging of the last Nintendo mobile game (CoM). I am enjoying it immensely and it fits nicely into the series. Can't wait for KH3
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: Have been a KH Fan for a long time and thought I would try the newest game in the series.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful game so far definitely worth the price, I'm a huge rpg fan, and KH is always fun, I didn't think I would like the monster simulator/trainer aspect but I really like it so far. Also this came surprisingly quick!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: being a fan of kingdom hearts (ok maybe super fan if the name wasnt proof enough) ive wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: being a fan of kingdom hearts (ok maybe super fan if the name wasnt proof enough) ive wanted to get this one for a while to finish my collection and it came exactly as expected the game came in its packaging and in my correct region i didnt know the game had AR cards which were not in the box but thats not the sellers fault mostly an error in the factory and because the game is slightly old already but i would buy from the seller again since everything came perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Superior of the Inbetween

customer_reviews.title: My son likes playing this game one of his favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Theses was a Christmas gift for my son, and to this day he still plays with it. He says it's so fun to play with that's like a fantasy world.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it.I personally do not engage in vid games but watching him play this was actually very interesting.
customer_reviews.author: sistina

customer_reviews.title: one word Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Once you know the story ( If not there are several videos of persons telling a summary of the events so far) this game will not be as confusing as some people will say. The game play is solid (though hard at some points , which is given when one plays a JRPG), the use of flow motion is a plus and i hope they carry it over to KH3. KH 3D: DDD is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Browman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS A GIFT TO MY NEPHEW HE LIKES THIS GAME.
customer_reviews.author: ALFREDO

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics for a 3DS! :)
customer_reviews.text: Great 3DS game for KoH fans. Would recommend 10/10. Awesome game play and really good graphics for a 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kingdom Hearts series!! This game was one of the main reasons why I bought a 3DS and it was absolutely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 of the best KH games so far
customer_reviews.text: Kingdom Hearts 2 is the best imo, but this game trounces all portable games, aside from the heavily engrossing birth by sleep. the TWENY charas are very cool, but you don't get to enjoy their fighting styles or anything. still haven't beat it yet, trying to pick up some extras, plenty of to do and probably the hardest game in the series.
customer_reviews.author: Sogi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: The game condition was perfect from the seller I received it from. The game is a huge improvement from the DS Recode. New game physics are challenging to master but you'll get the hang of it after a bit of playing.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleM1227

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: New in box, came without damage in good time. Great game, one of the more underrated for the 3ds, can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman E

customer_reviews.title: Needed this
customer_reviews.text: I love Kingdom Hearts and needed to get this game to continue the story (til I can get my hands on KH3). I love the story and of course the characters. The dropping is a bit odd for me and so are the controls. I just keep mixing them up like I'm playing on the playstation controller. However, this takes nothing from the game. Still a great entry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: it can be very annoying and i feel like it takes away from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge fan of some of the mechanics in this game, particularly having to switch between the two characters every 5 minutes, it can be very annoying and i feel like it takes away from the experience of the game
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: played non stop
customer_reviews.text: Other than the forced switching of characters, I really loved this installment. I love playing the game and experiencing both sides of the story, I just wish I could control when I dropped, like if I wanted to at all for a certain part of the game or not. You can switch between characters but you have a gauge that fills up and automatically swaps you out when it's full.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Fun  return to Kingdom Hearts
customer_reviews.text: Good game. Looks really nice on the 3DS. Haven't played a kingdom Hearts game since the PS2 days, but this one holds up well to the older ones. Graphics are slick & the controls are pretty good overall. Better than i anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Shemp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best kingdom hearts and is even better on the ps4
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cazares

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Came earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came earlier than expected. Everything perfect expect the case it just a blank case not the one that has the picture of the game.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA LEVESQUe

customer_reviews.title: It was what I wanted. 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I asked in advanced two things. Was this item brand new, sealed, unopened? Was it USA region? Yes to both. Item arrived in 4 days. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Another quality entry into the Kingdom Hearts series
customer_reviews.text: The game is great, if you've played any of the other games then you enjoy this game very much. Don't listen to anyone who tells you it's just a spin off if you want to make sense of the story then you should play all of the KDH games.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Ansem returns
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I really enjoyed this game. It was very fun and engaging. I really was not expecting the big twist at the end of the game. I won't spoil the game with spoilers but just like my title Ansem returns and that's all you really need to know until you play the game. I give the game a 9/10 just b/c there is some loop holes that need to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Shion

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Hearts game
customer_reviews.text: The person this game was purchased for is absolutely ecstatic. He loves this game soooo much. Really made his day. I appreciated the fact that it arrived so soon, also.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Samples

customer_reviews.title: The Best Game I have Ever Played For Years
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played a game like this since Kingdom Hearts 2. It is a very good game that is definitely worth more than its being sold for. This game captivates your imagination with vibrant characters and deep meanings. I am 15, I usually hate video games, I almost only play sports, but when I first tried Kingdom Hearts, I immediately fell in love with Kingdom Hearts. And this is no exception, I can assure you that you will love this game from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This game met my expectations and shattered them! I can't wait to continue playing seeing as I'm only maybe half way through the game. The story, the animation, the combat is exactly what I expected with a Kingdom Hearts game. And with the 3ds system it is much clearer than I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice but US restricted
customer_reviews.text: Nice game, only US restricted. Had to give it away to an American colleague
customer_reviews.author: Muis

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as one of her first games for her birthday and to get her into a game franchise that I grew up loving myself. She is loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: SteelAce

customer_reviews.title: Cool game
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty rad game though it's kinda short...!!! Your heavily rely on flowmotion moves throughout the game as the dream eaters can crowd up your space. It only gets a little tough if your level is not higher enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Hearts...
customer_reviews.text: Its not kingdom hearts III but it is a review for when KH III comes out since it pretty much tells you what has happened so far... good game for remembering all the KH games.
customer_reviews.author: akirascare

customer_reviews.title: A very fun entry to the Kingdom Hearts series
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game, I got many hours of enjoyment out of it
customer_reviews.author: Ken-G

customer_reviews.title: Another Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's birthday.She LOVES Kingdom Hearts and asked me for this for over a year. I love watching her play since the storyline is very easy to loose yourself too. The gameplay should be easy for anyone who has played one of the previous games.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: eye opening game!
customer_reviews.text: this game answers some of my more major KH questions that i had so the only thing left is for me to play this till i perfect my battles and unlock everything for the 8th time
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Love all things Kingdom hearts, get this to continue the story
customer_reviews.text: As a kingdom hearts fan I love it and it's fun and enjoyable, if your a kingdom hearts fan get it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Story is a little weak
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay is a 10, but I never played a kingdom hearts game for gameplay... I'm a story nut, and I really didn't care what was happening to any of the characters.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game, a bit OCD-inducing though. This one'll last a while. Package arrived on-time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Matthews

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it, but...
customer_reviews.text: This 3Ds game seems to be excellent, as my kid is enjoying it very much, but it says that inside the package was supposed to have an AR card, and in the one I received it is not, so my kid start asking questions because he wants that damn card.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great RPG
customer_reviews.text: I've played all of the other Kingdom Hearts games and really love the series. This is another good installment, but I find that I can't play as long because the 3ds controls hurt my hands after a bit. I prefer to play on a full console again...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fluhmann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much, my order arrived on time and I'm really happy
customer_reviews.author: sahar-alghamdi

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, but was not Prime shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, just recieved it today. Have been a fan of Kingdom Hearts ever since 2002 when the first one came out. I only bought a 3ds so I can play this game. Only reason I gave it 4 star was because i bought it with Prime Shipping, which is free two day shipping and it took 5 days to get to me...Hopefuly the seller looks at this review and fixes this problem so he doesnt make this mistake with anyone else. Other than that, great game and I cant put it down!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Mezian

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Kingdom Hearts Game
customer_reviews.text: A great Kingdom Hearts game. One of my faves, actually. The controls are a bit wonky if you're not using a New3DS or a Circle Pad Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kingdom Hearts is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Great add on to the greatest game series of all time!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. Haven't heard anything wrong with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Sister loves this game
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for mys sister. She probably hasnt even played it. Ive done extensive research on this game, it has great reviews. You or whoever you buy it for will no be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: a winner
customer_reviews.text: all the kingdom hearts games are a hit in our house. ..and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Game
customer_reviews.text: I think I just enjoyed the original so much it's hard to love the sequels. Okay game though. Hard to play on the tiny DS.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its Kingdom Hearts What's Not To Love. Great Price, Came Early
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: If you are playing the Kingdom Hearts series this game is critical specially with the new game coming out.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the order
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the order. Son's game system turned out to be the problem. The game forces the camera system and he broke his on the 2DS.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson he was thrilled!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the product, It's worth the wait, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great Game cant wait for the next one to come out this game doesnt dissapoint until you get to the end and theres nothing else to do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

product_meta.title: Kingdom Hearts 3D Dream Drop Distance
product_meta.description: Edition:StandardKing Mickey and Yen Sid prepare for an impending threat by putting Sora and Riku through the Mark of Mastery exam. Sora and Riku are sent into the Sleeping Worlds, where they will face enemies and allies that have never been seen before. If they can successfully complete the task they are given, they will be deemed true Keyblade Masters.
feature_bullets: Dual protagonists : Play as the two most popular characters of the franchise, Sora and Riku
Free flowa ction : Enjoy fast and effortless movements while interacting with the environment and Performing acrobatic attacks

Brand new creatures : Dream Eaters inhabit the Sleeping Worlds, and are split into two categories: Spirits and Nightmares; Recruit over 50 different types of Spirits as allies to fight alongside Sora and Riku
New Disney Worlds Beloved Disney Worlds and characters, such as La Cité des Cloches (The Hunchback of Notre Dame), make their series debut
Story progression With updated looks for Sora and Riku, and the impending conflict Made clear, this title is a big step forward in the series

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars761 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
